a.span: View the Scholars of the Month

div.class: uabb-module-content uabb-button-wrap uabb-creative-button-wrap uabb-button-width-auto uabb-creative-button-width-auto uabb-button-center uabb-creative-button-center uabb-button-reponsive-center uabb-creative-button-reponsive-center

div.div:
The Queen City Academy Charter School was chartered by the State of New Jersey in 1999. After a planning year, the school opened September 6, 2000 with seventy-two students in newly renovated facilities at 7-9 Watchung Avenue in Plainfield, New Jersey. The founders, created a school where small class sizes and a caring and nurturing atmosphere allowed scholars to acquire more knowledge than it was commonly assumed they were capable of achieving.
The school is now housed at 815 West 7th Street with a total of 252 scholars, Grades K-8. QCA has grown not only in size, but in initiative. Along with core subjects of Math, Science, Language Arts, and Social Studies, QCA offers Spanish, Music, Art, Dance, Physical Education and Health.
QCA prides itself on the achievements of its scholars through the Positive Referral Program as well as Battle of the Homerooms. Our students are not only educated but nurtured to become independent thinkers through the array of afterschool clubs and activities.

article.class: post-1585 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-tap-into-plainfield entry

h4.a: Queen City Academy Charter School Announces Plans to Become a High School

div.p: PLAINFIELD, NJ - Queen City Academy Charter School (QCACS) announced its expansion plans to become a high school for the 2020 - 2021 school year. Celebrating its 20th anniversary, QCAS was originally chartered in 1999 and opened in 2000. Today QCACS is the oldest charter school in … [Read More...] about Queen City Academy Charter School Announces Plans to Become a High School

article.class: post-1289 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-in-the-news category-tap-into-plainfield entry

h4.a: Plainfield Mayor Congratulates The Queen City Academy MLK Essay Contest Winners

div.p:
Plainfield Mayor Adrian O. Mapp attended The Queen City Academy charter school's morning meeting on Tuesday to present a congratulatory proclamation to the winners of the MLK Essay Contest.
Source: Plainfield Mayor Congratulates The Queen City Academy MLK Essay Contest Winners … [Read More...] about Plainfield Mayor Congratulates The Queen City Academy MLK Essay Contest Winners

article.class: post-862 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-in-the-news category-tap-into-plainfield entry

h4.a: New Jersey charter schools come together in advocacy for Parent Action Day

div.p: More than 500 charter school parents, educators and advocates from across the state, including New Brunswick, gathered at the Statehouse in Trenton Monday for a CharterStrong Parent Action Day rally to celebrate New Jersey’s 50,000 public charter school children and to raise awareness of the more … [Read More...] about New Jersey charter schools come together in advocacy for Parent Action Day

article.class: post-834 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-in-the-news category-tap-into-plainfield entry

h4.a: Queen City Academy Charter School Participates in National School Walkout Day

div.p: On Wednesday, March 14, 2018 the Queen City Academy Charter School (QCACS) participated in National School Walkout Day. This nationwide protest is both a memorial and protest action. Students and teachers across the United States walked out their schools this morning to honor the lives of the … [Read More...] about Queen City Academy Charter School Participates in National School Walkout Day

article.class: post-833 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-in-the-news category-tap-into-plainfield entry

h4.a: The Queen City Academy Hosts its Annual Read Across America Day

div.p: The Queen City Academy Charter School (QCA) hosted its Annual Read Across America Day. This event celebrates the birthday of Dr. Seuss and provides an opportunity to have every child reading in the company of a caring adult. Extra TV Personality, AJ Calloway, along with local dignitaries including … [Read More...] about The Queen City Academy Hosts its Annual Read Across America Day
